content: {"name": "The Simple Way", "alternate_name": "", "description": "People can sign up for text updates by texting FOOD to 866-551-1675.\n\nWait times may be long.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.thesimpleway.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3234 Potter Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Harrowgate", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19134", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9978678, "longitude": -75.11218960000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 423-3598", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Spanish Available"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Temporarily closed"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed for the last 2 weeks of the year"}]}
